Connect React to Django

19 Nov 2019

React Proxy Setting

Connecting django to React

1. proxy the request from 3000 to 8000

Â  - proxy ë¥¼ :3000 ì—ì„œ :8000ìœ¼ë¡œ ë³´ëƒ„ (react)

2. install django-cors-headers

Â  - ë³´ì•ˆìƒì˜ ë¬¸ì œ ì—†ì´ Ajaxë“±ì˜ í†µì‹ ì„ í•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•´ ì‚¬ìš©ë˜ëŠ” ë©”ì»¤ë‹ˆì¦˜ì´ CORSì„

Â  - Django ëŠ” ê¸°ë³¸ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì™¸ë¶€ì—ì„œì˜ ìš”ì²­ì„ ë§‰ìŒ

Â  - CORS í‘œì¤€ì€ ì›¹ ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ê°€ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ëŠ” ì •ë³´ë¥¼ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ìˆë„ë¡ í—ˆê°€ëœ ì¶œì²˜ ì§‘í•©ë¥¼ ì„œë²„ì—ê²Œ ì•Œë ¤ì£¼ë„ë¡ í—ˆìš©í•˜ëŠ” HTTP í—¤ë”ë¥¼ ì¶”ê°€í•¨ìœ¼ë¡œì¨ ë™ì‘

pip install django-cors-headers

Â  ì°¸ì¡°

3. Add â€˜corsheadersâ€™ to INSTALL_APPS

Â  ì°¸ì¡°

INSTALLED_APPS = [
    ...,
    INSTALLED_APPS,
    ...
]

4. Add â€˜corsheaders.middleware.CoreMiddlewareâ€™ before â€˜CommonnMiddlewareâ€™

MIDDLEWARE = [
    ...,
    "corsheaders.middleware.CorsMiddleware",
    "django.middleware.common.CommonMiddleware",
    ...
]

5. Add CORS_ORIGIN_ALLOW_ALL = True on base settings

base.py or settings.py

...
CORS_ORIGIN_ALLOW_ALLì„ = True

6. Make Djagno load the bunndles as static files with â€˜str(ROOT_DIR.path(â€˜frontedâ€™,â€™buildâ€™,â€™staticâ€™))â€™

django ê°€ ë²ˆë“¤ì„ static file (js, cssâ€¦) ì„ ë¡œë”©í•˜ê²Œ í•´ì•¼í•œë‹¤.

base.py or settings.py

STATICFILES_DIRS = [
    str(APPS_DIR.path("static")),
    str("/Users/user/Documents/git_repo/cafeteria_front/build/static"),
]

7. Create a views.py file on [root] folder

views.py

8. Create ReactAppView that read the file.

views.py

import os
from django.views.generic import View
from django.http import HttpResponse
from django.conf import settings


class ReactAppView(View):

    def get(self, request):
        try:
            with open(os.path.join("[path to react root folder]", "build", "index.html")) as file:
                return HttpResponse(file.read())
        except:
            return HttpResponse(
                """
                index.html not found!! build your react app
                """,
                status=501
            )

9. Add the ReactAppView as a URL

urlpatterns = [
    ...,
    ...,
    path("", views.ReactAppView.as_view()),
]
